required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Retrospective Study on Sexual Health in the Aftermath of an Obstetric Lesion of the Anal Sphincter
clinical_study.official_title: Retrospective Study on Sexual Health in the Aftermath of an Obstetric Lesion of the Anal Sphincter

brief_summary.textblock:
Lesions of the anal sphincter complicate 0.8% of childbirth in France. The sexual health of patients following this type of lesion is little studied, there are only about twenty articles on the subject.
The objective of this search is to study of the obstetric lesions of the anal sphincter

primary_outcome.measure: Retrospective study of obstetric lesions of the anal sphincter
primary_outcome.time_frame: Files analysed retrospectively from January 01, 2019 to December 31, 2019 will be examined]

study_pop.textblock: Adult woman who gave birth at term to a child born living in the maternity hospitals of Strasbourg University Hospital between 01/01/2019 and 12/31/2019

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion criteria:
- Adult woman (≥18 years old)
- Patient who gave birth at term to a child born living in the maternity hospitals of Strasbourg University Hospital between 01/01/2019 and 12/31/2019
- Single pregnancy
- 3rd degree or 4th degree perineal tear
- Intact perineum (control group)
- Good understanding of French orally
- Patient accepting to participate in the satisfaction telephone interview and not having expressed her opposition to the reuse of her data for the purposes of this research.
Exclusion criteria:
- Subject having expressed opposition to participating in the study
- Cesarean delivery
- Multiple pregnancy
- Premature delivery
- stillborn child
- impossibility of providing the subject with enlightened information (subject in an emergency situation, difficulties in understanding the subject, etc.)
- Subject under safeguard of justice
- Subject under guardianship or guardianship
- Subject under guardianship, curatorship or safeguard of justice

overall_official.affiliation: Service de gynécologie Obstétrique - Hôpitaux Universitaires de Strasbourg

facility.name: Service de gynécologie Obstétrique - Hôpitaux Universitaires de Strasbourg
